text: Nandao ni bu zhidao an la shi quanzhi tiandi wanwu de? Fan yousan geren mitan, ta jiushi di si ge canyu zhe; fan you wu geren mitan, ta jiushi di liu ge canyu zhe; fan you bi na geng shao huo geng duo de ren mitan, wulun tamen zai nali, ta zong shi yu tamen tong zai de; ranhou zai fuhuo ri, ta yao ba tamen de xingwei gaosu tamen. An la que shi quanzhi wanwu de
